post:
Servers located in Kansas City at wholesale internet DC in our own rack.
We've been in the hosting business since 2003.

We are 5 system administrators with years of experience, you're getting support from people who know their work, not from some outsourcing company that couldn't care less about your issues.

All servers are managed, we will help you move your sites from your previous host and make sure they're in working order, however we can not be held responsible for 3rd party application which wont work or are heavy on resources. We will help you optimize mysql and install whatever software you might need at no extra charge.
If you have any questions please contact us we'd be happy to answer any questions you might have.
